title: Buy all of THESE
description: With 2019 almost over its time to pick my favorite tech of the year.   Check out the LG OLED C9 TV:  Check out the LG SL10Y Sound Bar:  And the LG UltraGear monitor:   The details on the new Red Box Switch:  Full video on the Nintendo Switch Lite:  The best pro controller roundup feat the Xbox One Elite Series 2:  Why I think the base 2019 iPad is one of the best value Apple products:  More on the excellent OnePlus 7T:  Our iPhone 11 review:   Our original setup video with the LG C9 OLED:   Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
